summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4283 for the improvement of Meridian Avenue, from North 77th Street to North 85th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances; under Ordinance No. 50921, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
